title: Cannot push docker image using actions
body:
### Description

actions log
```
> exporting to image:
93.72 retrying in 4s
93.73 error: failed commit on ref "layer-sha256:18ded045e46e4afa6d6686fc2985e5a3ff95998be3ec262ddcf48f88fe177a8e": unexpected status from PUT request to https://gitea/v2/project/***/blobs/uploads/sytku1yerhd4d8ueb5alk9orh?digest=sha256%3A18ded045e46e4afa6d6686fc2985e5a3ff95998be3ec262ddcf48f88fe177a8e: 500 Internal Server Error
93.73 retrying in 4s
93.75 error: failed to copy: unexpected status from PUT request to https://gitea/v2/project/***/blobs/uploads/i6xsmdsvik6h7okbxiz2ml0zn?digest=sha256%3Aee7e11828533b300910617ada49c6f08c87709c5b2cba419aaeb5418567a93ea: 500 Internal Server Error
```

```

2025/04/14 10:25:20 .../container/container.go:92:apiError() [E] open /data/gitea/tmp/package-upload/rbqjw3cghvhl3m4tuwoqdeseb: no such file or directory

```

I have lots of free space, couple of days ago everything was ok

### Gitea Version

1.24.0+dev-582-gf6474cf2e9

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

No
